summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Conair Quick Twist; Bonus Pack Review Date: 2015/11/11 Store: Conair Product Description: ['Create quick, fun, styles with the Conair Quick Twist Bonus Pack. The Quick Twist Bonus Pack makes it easy to create beautiful, colorful twisty braids in seconds. Get creative and get your twist on! The Quick Twist allows you to create perfect braids in just 3 easy steps. First, push up the button to raise the hair clasp. Insert end of hair strand under and release button. Repeat on either side. Pull strands away from head and slide switch up to rotate twists. Lastly, rotate by hand, in the direction of the arrow on the styler, to create a perfect twisty braid. Twist it all together by adding ribbons, beads and elastics for totally twisted one-of-a-kind styles you create yourself. The Quick Twist Bonus includes 40 Scunci anti-slip mini elastics, 2 silky ribbons and 10 hair clips, 2 silky threads, 10 large hair clips, 1 strand of pearls, 1 sequin ribbon, 1 Conair Wet Dry Detangling Brush, 1 Conair Section and Style Comb, 2 Scunci Silicone Headbands, 4 Scunci Solid Knotted Ponytailers and 4 Scunci Animal Print Knotted Ponytailers. Requires 2 AA batteries (not included).'] Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 4 x 9.88 inches; 13.86 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CD205TV', 'UPC': '074108332424', 'Manufacturer': 'Conair'} Review Text: Pros:-
1)It makes twists of hair in braids that are cool, beautiful & trendy.
2) It is good for creating hair patterns for parties and special occasions.
3) The kit includes 40 anti-slip mini elastics, 2 silky ribbons and 10 hair clips.
4) The product runs with 2 AA batteries that is not included in the package.
Cons:-
One has to twist it by hand for 2 stranded twists. Review Title: Works ok.. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000) Review Date: 2020/08/13 Store: OLEWELL Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'} Review Text: This pack comes with 1000 multi colored and 1000 black rubber bands. They stretch well and can accommodate all the hair without pulling or damaging it. They can be used to tie at the end of a braid or for pony tails. They are colorful and could be matched with the dress color. For a simpler look, you could go with the black bands. They are a great hair ties especially for girls would love them. They came in a bulk pack that would last for a long time. Review Title: Stretchy colorful hair bands.. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Qiray Hair Ties Hair Accessories Set For Girls and Women,Large Retractable Cotton,18 Colors 36 Pieces. Review Date: 2020/08/13 Store: Qiray Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Material': 'Cotton', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.51 x 5.51 x 1.57 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 5.51 x 1.57 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582479'} Review Text: The pack comes with 18 pairs of hair bands of multicolors. These bands are colorful and pretty. They are a great hair accessory for girls. They can match the color of the hair bands with their dress color. There is a huge variety of colors to choose from. Every color comes with a pair in order to provide for 2 pony tails or 2 braids. For such a huge pack, the price is reasonable. It forms a great hair band set to mix and match the colors as per the attire. Review Title: Mega pack of colorful hair ties to mix and match... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces. Review Date: 2020/08/18 Store: Qiray Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'} Review Text: These hair ties look stunning with woven pearls. They could be used on pony tails as well as plaits. They come in 5 different colors and have 2 of each color. They are grand and would be apt for parties and special occasions. They come in a nice box to be stored after use.Price is very good for this set. I would definitely recommend it. Review Title: Stunning hair ties.. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: obmwang 10 Pieces Metal Headband for Women's Hair, Hair Hoop Spring Wavy Hair Band Non-Slip Headwear Hair Accessories for Women Girls Men (Multicolor) Review Date: 2020/08/20 Store: obmwang Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic, Metal', 'Brand': 'Obmwang', 'Item Form': 'Wrap', 'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 7 x 2.1 inches; 7.2 Ounces'} Review Text: The first thing that I noticed when I opened the pack was the size of these hair bands. They are large and would fit any head type. They stretch well and hold the hair firmly. Interior part of the headband is smooth and does not prick or pull the hair. They look simple in wavy pattern yet very useful especially when you leave the hair open, so that hair strands do not fall on your face. They come in so many colors, you could mix and mach your dresses with them. It comes individually wrapped so that you could also gift them. The price is good for this 10 pack set. Review Title: Stretchable headband with smooth interiors Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: AOFLLU Hair Clips for Girls, 120 Pcs No Slip Metal Snap Hair Clips Barrettes for Girls Kids Women Review Date: 2020/08/27 Store: AOFLLU Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AOFLLU', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Occasion': "Christmas, Valentine's Day", 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 2.9 x 0.7 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} Review Text: The first thing I noticed after getting these clips is how cute they were. They come in 30 different colors and are in plenty so that you could literally match with any dress color. They are soft when snapped to hair and won’t prick. They look so colorful. This is a value for money clip set. Girls would love them! Review Title: Cute and colorful snap clips..girls would love them! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2PCS Hair Clips Hairpin Headwear Styling Tools Double Layer Twist Plait Tools Hairstyle Hair Twister Clip Multi-Layer Hollow Woven Double Bangs for Knitting Hair Review Date: 2020/09/10 Store: ZDU Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ZDU', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthdays', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '4.68 x 2.4 x 1.06 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} Review Text: The pack comes with 2 twister clips, one longer and other shorter than that. The longer clip can be used on entire hair or for some strands of hair whereas the smaller clip is designed for a few strands of hair only. Various styles of hair can be made using these clips.
How to use
First put the clip on the hair, then take few strands of hair, twist and fit each bunch of hair inside the little clips above the main clip and close to create cool hair pattern and style.
Final hair looks really cool as in the pictures. These clips are great for everyday use. Review Title: Useful to create cool hair style.. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 6 Packs Pre Stretched Braiding Hair 26 Inch Ombre Professional Itch Free Synthetic Fiber Crochet Twist Braids Hair Extensions (26 Inch, 1B) Review Date: 2020/09/11 Store: msjoli Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'msjoli', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '26 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '15.39 x 7.48 x 2.68 inches; 1.31 Pounds'} Review Text: Got it to increase the length of hair to facilitate braiding. It worked well. Review Title: Works well.. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Vitamin C & 100% Pure Tea Tree Oil, Invisible Acne Spot Treatment Serum Oil to Clear Face & Body, Minimize Pores - Great Makeup Primer - Beard-Friendly (0.5oz) Review Date: 2020/09/11 Store: JOMO CARE Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Sensitive Skin,All Skin Types', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Brand': 'JOMO CARE', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Package Dimensions': '3.86 x 1.46 x 1.38 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '093674953956'} Review Text: I get occasional acne and got this serum to treat it. I apply it on spot areas where ever there is acne flair up. I usually apply it at night before sleeping. Presence of vitamin C and tea tree oil soothes the affected acne areas and helps it heal sooner. I am satisfied by the results. Review Title: Satusfied Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: FIDDY898 Rhinestone Wedding Hair Combs Leaves Design Crystal Bridal Hair Clips Alloy Hair Accessories for Women Gold Review Date: 2021/01/11 Store: FIDDY898 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'FIDDY898', 'Color': 'Silver', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '4.3 x 2 x 0.4 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FDSD070302'} Review Text: It is light to wear.
The teeth on the clip make it easy to clamp on the hair.
It looks pretty and delicate when worn.
It comes with golden bobby pins to use as added accessory.
Great for special ooccasions. Review Title: Pretty and delicate hair accessory for special occasions... Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: YouthBro 5 Pack Large Metal Hair Clip, Peal Hair Claw Barrette Catch Jaw Clamp for Women Girls to hold Thick Long Hair,Gold, Sliver, Rose Gold Review Date: 2021/01/23 Store: YouthBro Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'YouthBro', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Pearl', 'Material': 'Pearl, Metal', 'Package Dimensions': '10.47 x 7.68 x 2.36 inches; 6.17 Ounces'} Review Text: These claw clips came in a pack of 5 different patterns.
They expand well and hold all if m6 hair.
I can use a different style each time as per the occasion and my preference.
They are gentle and don’t pull my hair stands.
Each of them comes individually wrapped which is gives the flexibility of gifting to family and friends. Review Title: Nice claw clips ... Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Aibilye Shower Cap, 3Pcs Shower Cap For Women,Shower Cap For Kids, Double Waterproof,Hair Care Cap,Salon Shower Cap,Reusable, Medium Size(STYLE-3) Review Date: 2021/02/04 Store: Aibilye Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Aibilye', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Kid', 'Pattern': 'Floral', 'Size': 'Medium', 'Package Dimensions': '11.1 x 8.1 x 0.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces'} Review Text: I liked the color and design of these shower caps.
There are 2 layers in the cap, the top layer and and another water proof layer underneath it.
They were fairly good.
Only drawback I found is that the elastic on these caps are too loose.
In some days of use, it might loose its elastic power and might become loose.
Therefore I have reduced two stars from my review. Review Title: Shower cap good, elastic on caps very loose.. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Handmade Boho Flower Crown Floral Wreath Headbands for Women Girl Headpiece Review Date: 2021/02/04 Store: Heather & Willow Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Heather & Willow', 'Size': 'One Size', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 8 x 0.75 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '742567419382'} Review Text: I got this veil to use it like a crown for themed halloween party.
It is so artistic and beautiful.
The roses look very pretty and real.
It sits well on the head. Review Title: Artistic and beautiful.. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2PCS Hair Clips Hairpin Headwear Styling Tools Double Layer Twist Plait Tools Hairstyle Hair Twister Clip Multi-Layer Hollow Woven Double Bangs for Knitting Hair Review Date: 2020/09/10 Store: ZDU Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ZDU', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthdays', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '4.68 x 2.4 x 1.06 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} Review Text: The pack comes with 2 twister clips, one longer and other shorter than that. The longer clip can be used on entire hair or for some strands of hair whereas the smaller clip is designed for a few strands of hair only. Various styles of hair can be made using these clips.
How to use
First put the clip on the hair, then take few strands of hair, twist and fit each bunch of hair inside the little clips above the main clip and close to create cool hair pattern and style.
Final hair looks really cool as in the pictures. These clips are great for everyday use. Review Title: Useful to create cool hair style.. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 6 Packs Pre Stretched Braiding Hair 26 Inch Ombre Professional Itch Free Synthetic Fiber Crochet Twist Braids Hair Extensions (26 Inch, 1B) Review Date: 2020/09/11 Store: msjoli Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'msjoli', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '26 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '15.39 x 7.48 x 2.68 inches; 1.31 Pounds'} Review Text: Got it to increase the length of hair to facilitate braiding. It worked well. Review Title: Works well.. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Vitamin C & 100% Pure Tea Tree Oil, Invisible Acne Spot Treatment Serum Oil to Clear Face & Body, Minimize Pores - Great Makeup Primer - Beard-Friendly (0.5oz) Review Date: 2020/09/11 Store: JOMO CARE Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Sensitive Skin,All Skin Types', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Brand': 'JOMO CARE', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Package Dimensions': '3.86 x 1.46 x 1.38 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '093674953956'} Review Text: I get occasional acne and got this serum to treat it. I apply it on spot areas where ever there is acne flair up. I usually apply it at night before sleeping. Presence of vitamin C and tea tree oil soothes the affected acne areas and helps it heal sooner. I am satisfied by the results. Review Title: Satusfied Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: FIDDY898 Rhinestone Wedding Hair Combs Leaves Design Crystal Bridal Hair Clips Alloy Hair Accessories for Women Gold Review Date: 2021/01/11 Store: FIDDY898 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'FIDDY898', 'Color': 'Silver', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '4.3 x 2 x 0.4 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FDSD070302'} Review Text: It is light to wear.
The teeth on the clip make it easy to clamp on the hair.
It looks pretty and delicate when worn.
It comes with golden bobby pins to use as added accessory.
Great for special ooccasions. Review Title: Pretty and delicate hair accessory for special occasions... Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: YouthBro 5 Pack Large Metal Hair Clip, Peal Hair Claw Barrette Catch Jaw Clamp for Women Girls to hold Thick Long Hair,Gold, Sliver, Rose Gold Review Date: 2021/01/23 Store: YouthBro Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'YouthBro', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Pearl', 'Material': 'Pearl, Metal', 'Package Dimensions': '10.47 x 7.68 x 2.36 inches; 6.17 Ounces'} Review Text: These claw clips came in a pack of 5 different patterns.
They expand well and hold all if m6 hair.
I can use a different style each time as per the occasion and my preference.
They are gentle and don’t pull my hair stands.
Each of them comes individually wrapped which is gives the flexibility of gifting to family and friends. Review Title: Nice claw clips ... Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Aibilye Shower Cap, 3Pcs Shower Cap For Women,Shower Cap For Kids, Double Waterproof,Hair Care Cap,Salon Shower Cap,Reusable, Medium Size(STYLE-3) Review Date: 2021/02/04 Store: Aibilye Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Aibilye', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Kid', 'Pattern': 'Floral', 'Size': 'Medium', 'Package Dimensions': '11.1 x 8.1 x 0.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces'} Review Text: I liked the color and design of these shower caps.
There are 2 layers in the cap, the top layer and and another water proof layer underneath it.
They were fairly good.
Only drawback I found is that the elastic on these caps are too loose.
In some days of use, it might loose its elastic power and might become loose.
Therefore I have reduced two stars from my review. Review Title: Shower cap good, elastic on caps very loose.. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Handmade Boho Flower Crown Floral Wreath Headbands for Women Girl Headpiece Review Date: 2021/02/04 Store: Heather & Willow Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Heather & Willow', 'Size': 'One Size', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 8 x 0.75 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '742567419382'} Review Text: I got this veil to use it like a crown for themed halloween party.
It is so artistic and beautiful.
The roses look very pretty and real.
It sits well on the head. Review Title: Artistic and beautiful.. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
raw_response:
**Shopping Preferences and Patterns Summary:**

- **Hair Accessories**: Strong preference for various hair accessories including hair ties, clips, headbands, and styling tools.
- **Color Choices**: Favor for colorful and visually appealing items, particularly in hair accessories for mix-and-match versatility.
- **Functionality**: Importance placed on functionality, such as non-slip features and ease of use for styling, particularly for creating braids and various hair designs.
- **Occasion-Based Items**: Inclination towards products suitable for special occasions and themed events.
- **Variety and Bulk Purchases**: Enjoyment of variety in product styles and opting for bulk packages that provide good value.
- **Quality Concerns**: Average to high satisfaction ratings indicate a critical eye for product quality, with particular attention to durability and performance.
- **Aesthetic Appeal**: Attraction to products that combine practicality with aesthetic beauty, such as elegant hair clips and decorative crowns.
- **Value for Money**: Preference for reasonably priced items, often opting for multi-packs that offer greater value.
- **Health and Beauty Products**: Interest extends beyond hair accessories to skincare, especially products that address specific concerns like acne.

Overall, the individual exhibits a clear inclination towards stylish, functional hair accessories and beauty items, often with an emphasis on color, variety, and special occasion readiness.
